document_data.name: Palien
document_data.mainbody: '''Palien''' was a warrior and a hero, who was celebrated for fending off several groups of monsters during the founding of [[Thundertree]].
document_data.History:
Palien of [[Neverwinter]] set out to Thundertree to strike back at the monsters who attacked those in the area. The warrior fought many approaching monsters valiantly in [[Neverwinter Wood]], with [[spear]] and [[shield]], to the relief of the locals. In the honor of Palien, they erected a {{SI|10|ft}} wooden statue of the hero in the center of Thundertree's town square.

Several years later, ''circa'' [[1491 DR]],{{Phandelver-time}} the statue was still standing, despite the eruption of [[Mount Hotenow]]. It was, however, quite weathered and lent to one side.
